title: Serene Blue Floral Bliss for Your Baby Shower
description: Welcome your little one with our charming baby shower decorations, featuring delicate white carnations, soft blue hydrangeas, and subtle baby’s breath, beautifully arranged in rustic glass bottles. Enhanced with light blue table runners, these elegant setups create a calm and joyful atmosphere for your special celebration.

title: Royal Bloom – A Disney Princess Baby Shower
description: Welcome your little princess with a fairy-tale celebration inspired by the magic of Disney royalty. This baby shower design combines soft peach and lavender blooms — including delicate roses, lisianthus, and hydrangeas — with shimmering accents fit for a castle.

title: Magical Purple Princess Baby Shower Extravaganza
description: Transform your baby shower into a fairy tale with our enchanting decor, featuring vibrant purple flowers, elegant roses, and delicate chrysanthemums arranged in glass vases and ceramic pots. Complemented by a purple table runner, this princess-themed setup creates a whimsical and joyful celebration for your little one’s arrival.

title: Little Wild One – Jungle Safari Baby Shower
description:
Bring the wonder of the wild to your baby shower with this zoo-themed floral design, blending the soft charm of plush giraffes, lions, and jungle friends with a lush arrangement of greenery and fresh florals.

Featuring layers of eucalyptus, ruscus, and tropical leaves, accented with soft white and yellow blooms, the setup creates a natural safari look that’s both elegant and playful

title: Winnie the Pooh Baby Shower Setup
description: Perfect for baby showers filled with warmth and whimsy, this setup features Winnie the Pooh plush dolls surrounded by a charming mix of lush green foliage arrangements. Ideal for garden parties or indoor gatherings, it brings a soft woodland feel and storybook magic to celebrate your little one’s arrival.
